name: 1 Line 3D Mazes
overview: 1 Line 3D Mazes is an old school pseudo 3D maze game using pseudo vector graphics for the Sinclair ZX Spectrum coded in a single line of BASIC code. It was developed by Einar Saukas, Digital Prawn, and Johnan "Dr . BEEP" Koelman and released into the public domain in 2008. The game consists of three different mazes/modes.
